mapper.update:
update choice_question
score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
rightAnswer = #{rightanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subjectId = #{subjectid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
question = #{question,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
choiceA = #{choicea,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
choiceB = #{choiceb,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
choiceC = #{choicec,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
choiceD = #{choiced,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update choice_question set score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, rightAnswer = #{rightanswer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subjectId = #{subjectid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, question = #{question,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, choiceA = #{choicea,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, choiceB = #{choiceb,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, choiceC = #{choicec,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, choiceD = #{choiced,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
